name: Pollen Puff
effect: When this move is used against an ally it will heal 1 HP instead of dealing damage. The User may spend 1 Will to increase the healing to 5. Only applies the healing under stress unless the User is expending Will.
description: The Pokemon creates a puff of pollen that explodes on the foe's face and gives them a terrible allergy. When consumed these puffs are sweet and very nutritious.
